title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Webcams
body: Webcams      New! Please use the following links to access the webcams as we resolve issues with our website.KYVC  WebcamManzanita Lake Webcam                      Kohm Yah-mah-nee Visitor Center webcam This is the view looking north from the Kohm Yah-mah-nee Visitor Center. The peak to the left is Mt. Diller and Pilot Pinnacle sits to its right. On cool days, it is possible to see steam rising from the Sulphur Works hydrothermal area.   View webcam              Kohm Yah-mah-nee Visitor Center Webcam Time Lapse Videos 2010 - 2011 Time lapse (external site) 2009 - 2010 Time lapse (20 MB)                       Manzanita Lake webcam This is the view looking southeast from the northwest shore of Manzanita Lake. Lassen Peak rises in the distance.    View webcam                   Northwest Entrance webcam Highway 44 at the junction of Highway 89 (Lassen Park Highway) near the Northwest Entrance and Manzanita Lake Area. Webcam courtesy of CalTrans. View webcam
